resources:
Inspire Settings Treat your fellers… Font Color Size Initializing… There was an error loading the app. Please check your internet connection and restart :) \"There was an error registering your device to the app, please restart and try again in a few minutes\" Cannot upload empty treat. Make sense doesn\'t it? :) An error has occurred, you are not registered to the app\'s main messages channel. That\'s Ok, message can still be displayed. There are no treats to display, yet… There seem to be a network problem. Please check your connection and restart the app Please log in to access this important screen Please wait… There was a error refreshing the data. Please try again later There was an error posting the treat, please try again There was an error updating the treat, please try again Treat was correctly posted to users but there seem to be a table relation error (server problem), please contact your administrator. wants to share something with you new posts from Continue reading… Press back again to leave screen. Data will be lost. Treat was uploaded but notification was not sent. Users will see it when they open the app.
Hello blank fragment Your password sir.. Login There seems to be a problem logging in. Please check you connection and try again There seem to be a problem logging out. Please check you connection and try again
It\'s a pity, but we had a wrong password.. You can\'t fool us so easily, put a real password in the box :) There seem to be a user validation problem. Try logging in again. If it doesn\'t help, contact your system administrator Oops Ok Delete Edit This treat will be lost for all eternity Are you sure? Delete There was an error deleting the treat Cancel Error retrieving the original image for this treat. Using default background instead.
//Facebook 827806877381190 fb827806877381190
